org.apache.solr.util

Class SolrCLI.RunExampleTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.solr.util.SolrCLI.ToolBase
      • org.apache.solr.util.SolrCLI.RunExampleTool
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SolrCLI.Tool
    Enclosing class:
    SolrCLI

    public static class SolrCLI.RunExampleTool
extends SolrCLI.ToolBase
    Supports an interactive session with the user to launch (or relaunch the -e cloud example)
